body.name: Moroccan Argan Oil Conditioner - Sulfate Free, Anti Frizz Hydrating Thickening Care for Women and Men - Deep Moisturizing Treatment for Color Treated, Curly, Frizzy, Damaged and Dry Hair

features: MOROCCAN ARGAN OIL: This argan oil conditioner uses authentic Moroccan botanical extracts; Argan oil for hair has been used in Morocco for centuries to smooth hair, prevent breakage and nourish dry and damaged locks; With real argan oil, this deep conditioner for dry damaged hair is the formula you need for amazing shine

SULFATE FREE: Do away with frizzy hair products that contain questionable ingredients; This hair conditioner for men and women is contains no sulfates or parabens; What’s more, our sulfate free conditioner is never tested on animals; For a hydrating conditioner that’s kind to the planet, trust only Bingo Hair Care

SMOOTHES HAIR: If you’re tired of losing the battle to frizz, our anti frizz conditioner is the answer; The secret to our Moroccan oil hair products is how the argan forms a protective coating around each strand to smooth the follicles; This means that our conditioner for dry hair gives you back the control you deserve

PREVENTS DAMAGE: If you’re in search of a conditioner for damaged hair that not only reverses the signs of damage, but also actively works to prevent it in the future, our Moroccan oil conditioner is the solution; This hair conditioner for damaged dry hair forms a shield to prevent harm from heat, sun and blow dry exposure

SALON GRADE FORMULA: We’ve worked in close consultation with respected salon care experts to engineer a hair conditioner for dry hair that’s professional grade; Our argan oil conditioner for hair is safe to use on bleach and color treatments as well as being suited for both men and women

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Strengthen Hair with our Argan Oil Range for Less Breakage and Incredible Shine Shampoo & Conditioner Set Add to Cart Hydrating Mask Add to Cart Shampoo Add to Cart Conditioner Add to Cart Customer Reviews 4.3 out of 5 stars 27,290 4.4 out of 5 stars 5,145 4.5 out of 5 stars 2,075 4.5 out of 5 stars 1,686 Price $26.99$26.99 $9.99$9.99 $14.99$14.99 $14.99$14.99 INTENDED USE Smooth and hydrate Intense hydration Clean buildup, smooth hair Hydrate, nourish & smooth ADDITIONAL BENEFITS Protects against damage Soft and manageable hair Amazing hydration Beautiful shine KEY INGREDIENTS Argan oil, jojoba, keratin Argan oil, keratin Argan oil, aloe, rosemary Argan oil, chamomile & keratin RESOLVES PROBLEM Dry, frizzy and brittle hair Dry and broken hair Unclean hair Dry and brittle hair FOR HAIR TYPE All hair types All hair types All hair types All hair types SUGGESTED USE Wash and rinse normally Leave in for 30 mins & rinse 60 second lather and rinse Leave for 2 minutes and rinse

Salon Grade Conditioner We worked with salon experts to create a premium Moroccan oil conditioner that has been formulated to professional standards and restores shine. All Hair Types Our conditioner for dry hair is ideal for women and men. What's more, it's also safe for bleached hair and won't strip dye from color treatments. Sleek and Shining Get the sleek hair you deserve with our hydrating argan conditioner. It's the Moroccan oil that fights frizz by forming a smooth protective coating. No More Split Ends Split ends are over with Bingo Hair Care's Moroccan argan oil products. Our conditioner helps reverse the signs of damage by nourishing each strand.

Will this conditioner strip my hair of color? No. Our Moroccan argan oil conditioner won't strip your hair of color and is safe to use on bleached hair. This is because the conditioner uses a gentle formula that's crafted specifically to moisturize and replenish, without being overly harsh. How does this make my hair smoother? Argan oil's high vitamin E and fatty acids content nourishes hair, taming frizz and enhancing shine. Bingo Hair Care’s conditioner smooths cuticles, promoting sleekness and manageability. Will this make my hair shinier? Yes. This Moroccan argan oil conditioner smooths hair cuticles, reflecting more light and enhancing shine. It also adds moisture, making hair appear healthier and glossier with a sleek and dazzlingly smooth finish that turns heads. Won’t the oil weigh my hair down? No. Our Moroccan argan conditioner boosts hair volume. In fact, the oil coats strands and adds space between the individual hairs. Suitable for all hair types: wavy, frizzy, straight, and color-treated as well as bleached. How does this stop split ends? Bingo Hair Care's Moroccan argan oil conditioner seals and nourishes hair cuticles by creating a protective seal. It furthermore reduces moisture loss and preventing split ends. It also strengthens and protects hair strands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is great my hair has been shiny and hydrated. Even my friends noticed and commented! Also it smells just lovely and being someone that only washes once a week, it still smells great on wash day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love the fragrance
reviews.reviewText: I needed something with no sulfates and no parabens. The fragrance is beyond awesome! I wish I could have a candle with this fragrance and air freshener with this fragrance. It just makes my hair smells so good.!!! I wish my whole house, my car, everything could smell this wonderful!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An Inexpensive Tool, To Manage Hair
reviews.reviewText: This conditioner comes with a pump that is easy to use, mouth is the ideal size, meaning the right amount comes out during pumping, which for me avoids waste. After wetting hair with water, I massage scalp, drench head and hair with apple cider vinegar mixture, massage head again, rinse, and detangle, which is an easy process. Then, saturate hair shafts and ends, with conditioner, massaging scalp, and running hands through hair, which is an easy task. Rinse, t-shirt dry, and apply a leave in conditioner. That is my consistent weekly hair routine, simple, inexpensive and to the point. As long as my hair continues to strive and flourish, this is the only rinse out hair conditioner, for my hair. No MORE breakage. No more hair flying around on the floor or dropping in the sink, NO MORE! No additional products causing havoc. Strength is evident, and length is increasing, even the left side, which has been unresponsive for some time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I love the smell
reviews.reviewText: The scent is great. It is sulfate free and leaves my hair very soft. No build up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes hair super soft!
reviews.reviewText: This stuff really helps my curly hair. My hair is so dry and I even leave it in my hair. Doesn’t make my hair look great just super soft curls.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite conditioner
reviews.reviewText: It doesn't weigh hair down. Hair stays light, silky, and shiny. Quality of water also matters, I notice better results in places that have better water quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I actually love this conditioner. Makes my hair so soft and its light weight. However the smell is way too much. If you are sensitive to perfumey smells, you prob wont be okay with this. I wont buy again because of this. Bummer because its great conditioner

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Cream Rinse
reviews.reviewText: I love everything about this cream rinse after shampooing hair. I have scalp psoriasis and this product is great along with the T-Sal shampoo.
